content: Register via MyLankaTel app or my.lankatel.lk: Enter mobile number, verify OTP, set password (8+ characters), set security question. Access: view bills, pay online, manage packages, track usage.
Reset via app/website: Click 'Forgot Password', enter mobile number, verify OTP (valid 5 min), create new password. If OTP issues: Call 1234.
Upgrade: Prepaid - *#123# or app (immediate). Postpaid - Call 1234, app, or service center. Takes effect: immediate (data-only) or next billing cycle (plan changes).
Postpaid: 30-day notice required via 1234 or service center. Continues until next cycle. Early downgrade fee may apply if in contract. Prepaid: activate lower package when current expires.
Call 1234 or visit service center. Min 1 month, max 6 months. Fee: LKR 200/month (keeps number). Reactivate: call 1234 or service center.
Voluntary suspension: Call 1234 (immediate). Non-payment: Clear dues + LKR 150 late fee + LKR 500 reconnection fee. Service restored within 2 hours.
Call 1234 or visit service center with NIC. Postpaid: 30-day notice, clear all balances. Return rented equipment. Deposit refund within 14 days. ETF if cancelling before contract end.
Enable in MyLankaTel app > Settings > Security > Enable 2FA. Choose SMS OTP or Authenticator app. Required for: login from new device, transactions over LKR 5,000, account changes, SIM replacement.
Visit service center with NIC. Fee: LKR 300. Same number retained. New SIM issued within 30 minutes. For theft: bring police report.

SMS 'PORT<space>Number' to 1234 from current number. Receive UPC (valid 15 days). Visit service center with NIC and UPC. Fee: LKR 500. Timeline: 3-5 business days. Requirements: number active 90+ days, no outstanding dues.
Call 1234 or visit service center. Requirements: proof of income, address verification, credit check. Same number retained. Processing: 24-48 hours. Security deposit may apply.
MyLankaTel app > Billing > Auto-Pay. Choose payment method (card, bank debit, wallet). Set payment date. SMS alert 2 days before debit. Ensure sufficient funds to avoid LKR 500 failed payment fee.
Call 1236 or email billing@lankatel.lk within 7 days of bill receipt. Provide bill reference and details. Investigation: 5-10 days. If error confirmed, credit issued. Escalate to TRC if unresolved.
Postpaid only. Call 1234 or app > Family Plans. Choose pool: 50GB (LKR 3,000), 100GB (LKR 5,000), 200GB (LKR 8,500), 500GB (LKR 18,000). Max 10 members. Savings: 30-40% vs individual plans.

Call 1234 at least 24 hours before travel. Provide dates and destination. Requirements: account active 90+ days, no dues, deposit (LKR 5,000-25,000). Activation within 2-4 hours. Check rates at my.lankatel.lk.

Enroll within 30 days of device purchase. Tiers: LKR 350/month (up to Rs 50k), LKR 650/month (Rs 50k-100k), LKR 950/month (Rs 100k-200k). Coverage: screen, liquid, theft, accidental damage. Max 2 claims/year, LKR 2,500 excess per claim.

Silver (LKR 3,000+ monthly): 5% discount, priority support. Gold (LKR 7,000+ monthly): 10% discount, dedicated manager, airport lounge. Platinum (LKR 15,000+ monthly): 15% discount, personal concierge, unlimited lounge access.
Visit service center with student ID, admission letter, NIC. Valid 1 academic year. Benefits: 30GB (LKR 600), 50GB (LKR 900), educational app data free, device discounts up to 15%.
Age 60+. Visit service center with NIC. Benefits: 20% discount on voice plans, priority support, free home installation, dedicated senior support line. Lifetime validity.
Earn 10 points per LKR 100 spent. Redeem: 500 points = 1GB, 300 points = 100 mins, 1000 points = LKR 100 off bill. Referral bonus: 500 points. Anniversary bonus: 1000 points. Valid 12 months.

Chat-based account actions are available only after verification. Supported actions: check balance, connection information, recent account actions, list subscriptions, list tickets, create a support ticket (including live agent requests), activate a service, and deactivate a service. Provide your LankaTel mobile number to receive a 6-digit OTP sent to the email on file. Enter the OTP within 10 minutes to verify. After verification, actions run on your account without re-sharing email or phone.
